team.name: John Martinez
team.bio: With over 20 years in construction and project management, John founded Ascent Group in 2009 with a vision to deliver exceptional craftsmanship across the GTA. His commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has built our reputation as a trusted contractor.

team.name: Sarah Chen
team.bio: Sarah brings 15 years of operational excellence to Ascent Group. She ensures every project runs smoothly, on time, and within budget while maintaining our high standards of quality and safety.

team.name: Michael Thompson
team.bio: A master craftsman with 18 years of painting experience, Michael leads our painting division with precision and expertise. His attention to detail and knowledge of advanced techniques ensures flawless finishes.

team.name: David Kowalski
team.bio: David is our go-to expert for all stucco and EIFS installations. With 16 years specializing in exterior systems, he combines traditional techniques with modern materials for lasting results.

team.name: Jennifer Lee
team.bio: Jennifer ensures every client has an exceptional experience from first contact to project completion. Her dedication to communication and satisfaction has earned us countless referrals.

team.name: Robert Garcia
team.bio: Robert's primary focus is keeping our team and your property safe. With 12 years in construction safety, he implements and monitors protocols that exceed industry standards.

sustainability.commitment: At Ascent Group, we're committed to sustainable practices that protect our environment while delivering exceptional results.

initiatives.title: Low-VOC Materials
initiatives.description: We prioritize low and zero-VOC paints and coatings to improve indoor air quality and reduce environmental impact.
initiatives.impact: Reduced harmful emissions by 80% compared to traditional paints

initiatives.title: Waste Reduction
initiatives.description: Comprehensive recycling program for paint cans, materials, and job site waste. Unused paint donated to community programs.
initiatives.impact: Diverted 85% of job site waste from landfills in 2023

initiatives.title: Energy-Efficient Solutions
initiatives.description: Reflective coatings and insulation systems that reduce heating and cooling costs for our clients.
initiatives.impact: Average 15-20% energy cost reduction for clients

initiatives.title: Water Conservation
initiatives.description: Water-based products and efficient cleanup processes minimize water usage and contamination.
initiatives.impact: 30% reduction in water usage per project

initiatives.title: Local Sourcing
initiatives.description: Partner with local suppliers to reduce transportation emissions and support our community.
